fullText: Hugh Jackman brings his considerable star power to the role of Harold Hill, but the production feels more like a showcase for its leading man than a fully realized revival.
dtliExcerpt: Hugh Jackman brings his considerable star power to the role of Harold Hill, but the production feels more like a showcase for its leading man than a fully realized revival.
